.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkApplicationInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_APPLICATION_INFO
* [[VUID-VkApplicationInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL`
* [[VUID-VkApplicationInfo-pApplicationName-parameter]] If pname:pApplicationName is not `NULL`, pname:pApplicationName must: be a null-terminated UTF-8 string
* [[VUID-VkApplicationInfo-pEngineName-parameter]] If pname:pEngineName is not `NULL`, pname:pEngineName must: be a null-terminated UTF-8 string
****
